nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Planets in Peril

The Clone Wars: Planets in Peril focuses on the newest worlds from the Clone Wars universe, and how they're being affected by the fighting. It was written by Bonnie Burton and was published on August 16, 2010.
The Clone Wars are spreading and new planets are in danger. Will they fight with the Jedi or will they turn to the Separatists?
